summary: Professional video editor with unified architecture featuring timeline engine, keyframe animations (Alight Motion style), WebGL GPU rendering, shader-based effects (After Effects style), multi-format export (video/GIF/image sequences), and Motoko backend for project persistence. Home page redesigned with CapCut-inspired layout: search bar with filters, Recent Projects horizontal carousel, Create section (Video Edit/Photo Edit/Auto Cut), AI Tools wizard-based interfaces, and Templates section with animated 3D preview cards. Features glassmorphism UI, Framer Motion animations, global 3D page transitions, Three.js background, and mobile-responsive design. Comprehensive AI orchestration layer with expanded feature set across 8 AI categories: Generation AI (text→image/video, voice cloning with ElevenLabs, music generation, B-roll, logos, stickers, character consistency, face-aware generation), Editing AI (highlight detection, timeline intelligence with AI-suggested cuts/effects/zooms, motion AI with auto keyframes/easing/camera shake/parallax), Enhancement AI (HDR enhancement, skin tone correction, flicker removal, face restoration, old video restoration), Creator AI (word-level subtitle animation with emoji insertion, template system with auto-apply, brand kit integration, object/face tracking, AI glow/blur effects, green screen removal), Assistant AI (enhanced context-aware chat with command interface), Growth AI (title/hook/caption generators, hashtag AI, best posting time recommendations, virality prediction with hook analysis/retention/scroll-stop scores, A/B caption testing), Experimental AI (actor replacement, AI avatar presenter, eye contact correction, AI hand gestures, script→edited video, AI camera framing), and System AI (AI caching, smart job scheduling, device-aware quality optimization, lag prediction & avoidance). All features implemented with complete UI/UX workflows, full job submission flows ready to plug into AI APIs (Replicate, ElevenLabs, Runway), and actual Motoko backend logic with performance optimizations. Features unified AIJob type system, Motoko backend job manager with persistent queue and optimization logic, dual AI integration (mock + API integration points), and seamless video editor integration.
architectural_notes: Single unified architecture with one core state connecting all engines
Zustand store managing time, clips, layers, keyframes, and effects
Separate engines: Timeline, Keyframe, Effect, Render (WebGL), and Export
Component structure: UI layer (React) → Engine layer → Store layer
Keyframe interpolation for smooth property animations (x, y, scale, rotation)
WebGL-based GPU rendering for real-time preview performance
Shader-based effects system for extensible post-processing
Motoko backend actor for persistent project storage on ICP
Multi-format export pipeline (video, GIF, image sequence)
Modular folder structure: ui/, engine/, store/, shaders/

existing_features.title: Implement core editor state management using Zustand with types for Keyframe (time, value), Clip (id, start, duration, layer, transform with x/y/scale/rotation keyframe arrays, effects array), and store methods for addClip, setTime, playing state, and clips array

Create TimelineEngine class that accepts clips array in constructor and provides getActiveClips method to filter clips active at a given time (where time >= clip.start AND time <= clip.start + clip.duration)

Implement KeyframeEngine with interpolate function that takes keyframe array and time, finds prev/next keyframes around current time, and returns linearly interpolated value using formula: prev.value + t * (next.value - prev.value) where t = (time - prev.time) / (next.time - prev.time)
Create EffectEngine class with Effect type (name string, uniforms Record<string, number>) and add method to register effects in effects array

Implement CoreEngine class with renderClip method that takes clip and time, uses interpolate function to calculate x/y/scale/rotation values from clip transform keyframes at current time, and returns transform object with interpolated values
Create ExportEngine module with exportProject async function that accepts project data and logs export initiation with placeholder for frame-by-frame rendering
Build main App component with editor layout containing Toolbar, Preview, Inspector, and Timeline components arranged in professional video editor layout using Tailwind CSS with dark theme
Create Toolbar component with controls for play/pause, add media, add text, add shape, effects, and export buttons connected to editor store

Implement Timeline component displaying clips on layers with horizontal time axis, showing clip start/duration as positioned bars, supporting drag to reposition clips, and connected to editor store for time scrubbing

Build Preview component with WebGL canvas rendering active clips using CoreEngine renderClip at current time, applying transforms (position, scale, rotation) with Three.js and React Three Fiber for GPU-accelerated rendering of all media types
